snippet: Abbi Jacobson and Ilana Glazer want to expand “Broad City,” their Web comedy series, for television, on FX.
abstract: Abbi Jacobson and Ilana Glazer are developing their Web comedy series, Broad City, for television, on FX.
lead_paragraph: Abbi Jacobson and Ilana Glazer want to expand “Broad City,” their Web comedy series, for television, on FX.

headline.seo: Young Comics Adapting ‘Broad City’ from Web to FX
headline.main: Adrift in New York, Web Comics Seek a Larger Audience
headline.print_headline: Adrift in New York, Web Comics Seek A Larger Audience
